elements.title: Sourdough Fire (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one of three hydroelectric dams on the Skagit River continued to operate as the Sourdough Fire (pictured) burned nearby?

elements.title: Mitchell Agude (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that although doctors said Mitchell Agude would live the rest of his life in a vegetative state following a skateboarding accident at age nine, he recovered in three days and now plays in the NFL?

elements.title: Master of Magic (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Master of Magic, released in 2022, is a faithful remake of the 1994 classic of the same name?

elements.title: Philip Sherman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Jewish Telegraphic Agency named Philip Sherman one of "America's Top Mohels"?

elements.title: Mr Right (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mae Stephens described Meghan Trainor as her "role model music mother" after they collaborated on "Mr Right"?

elements.title: a hoard of more than 400,000 silver dollars (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1974, a hoard of more than 400,000 silver dollars was discovered in Nevada?

elements.title: Olivia Wingate (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the hometown newspaper of soccer player Olivia Wingate named her "Female Athlete of the Decade" for the 2010s?

elements.title: a Michigan TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Michigan TV station was built on a former circus ground?
